function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contaminated air not effectively removed","Impact":"Spread of airborne diseases, increased health risks","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and testing of air purification systems, use of effective filtration methods","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, UVGI (ultraviolet germicidal irradiation) systems","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Ineffective sterilization of air","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases through the ventilation system","Mitigation":"Use of effective sterilization methods, regular monitoring and maintenance of sterilization equipment","Technologies":"Chemical sterilization agents, UV-C irradiation systems","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate distribution of treated air","Impact":"Uneven air quality in different areas of the building, increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Proper design and installation of air distribution system, regular maintenance and testing of air distribution components","Technologies":"Air balancing systems, zoning controls","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
